definition: A formal notice or caution given to someone as a consequence of their actions, typically used in official settings or legal contexts to warn or reprimand individuals for their behavior.

examples.german: Er erhielt eine Verwarnung wegen Fehlverhaltens.
examples.english: He received a warning for misconduct.
The warning was documented in writing.
